issue.title: [CF 1089] Talented Spells + Icon Events
issue.body:
v7.2.4 r19 (g88c7c1b)

http://puu.sh/fVSkR/8b6206467d.jpg

Talented spells seem to not play nice with events that give them icon events, specifically in my case a border (note reck/blood fury have a yellow box while usable, not bloodbath). This has been persistent for a while, months at least. This happens both when entering combat (aura appearing) and after it goes on cooldown then becomes usable again, so nothing to do with it first appearing.

comments.body:
You discovered a rare bug with the condition system. You have an opening parenthesis on the first condition on that icon, but it isn't displayed in the editor since there are only 2 conditions. The "Only trigger if icon shown" checkbox works by wrapping your old conditions in parentheses, and tacking on an Icon Shown condition. Parentheses are ignored when there are less than 3 conditions, but the tacked-on condition was pushing it to 3 conditions. This resulted in a mismatch of parentheses (one extra opening on condition #1), which is handled silently by the code because there are lots of bells and whistles in the condition editor to yell when your parentheses are invalid. The invalid state comes about as a result of things that are done outside of configuration, so the condition editor couldn't warn about it.

Fixed in g621369b.

Edited Mar 1, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
